scenario_text.value:
Ew, I bet there’s a bunch of mice in there.
Yuck!

Oh, you’ve never seen a mouse? They’re small
and quick, scampering around nibbling stuff.

It’ll be fine! They can nibble all they want,
my shell will protect you, Miu!

Oh hey, that’s true! Thanks, Syakomon, you’re
the best!
(Still, there are worse ways to be, right?)
I’ll be fine as long as Syakomon’s with me!
